inn1.comm: full and swinging away a touch, Karthik leans across to square drive it through point for couple of runs
this one is on the middle stump line, straighter and Karthik cautiously pushes it out to the off side
slips to the legs and Karthik flicks it past Bernard at square leg
lovely outswinger has Karthik reaching out for it and the ball curves past the outside edge. The surface is shining actually, bit like old Sabina Park and the old Sharjah wickets.
Gone!  Taylor gets him with a delivery that shaped away very late. The length drew Karthik forward before the ball tailed away to catch the outside edge. Superb delivery. Great to watch.
Two slips in place but Taylor sprays this wide down the leg side
around the middle stump line, defended back down the pitch
Rampaul is back for this game but starts off with a wide down the leg side.
pushes this across Gambhir who lets it go through to Ramdin

What a start by the Windies. India two down and wobbling away. It wasn't a great delivery but hey try telling that to Gambhir. It was short in length and well outside off stump, Gambhir, rooted to the crease, has a lame poke at it. Edge and gone! The crowd roar. Sabina Park has come alive. The ball was full and well outside off stump, Gambhir's foot don't go anywhere but his bat does.
Yuvraj is greeted with a lifting delivery and he is in trouble. He takes his eyes off the ball and fends it off in an ungainly manner to the leg side.

Rampaul take a bow. Rohit Sharma is back in the hutch. The crowd roar. Awesome scenes here. Full and swinging away and Rohit doesn't lean into his drive. Edge and Ramdin almost clangs it but the ball bounds off his gloves to second slip. 'Thank you come again Rohit', Sabina Park seems to be saying as they go mad in celebration. Enter MSD.
walks out to defend to the off side of the pitch
oh superb delivery curving away from the outside edge. Dhoni walks out, almost stumbles out to get close to the line but is beaten by the late movement.
on a good length, moving away from Yuvraj who is beaten as he pushes inside the line

Edged just short of the second slip. It landed back of length and moved away from Yuvraj who went back and tried to drive on the up. Almost fatal mistake. The ball flew off the edge, the second slipper crouched but it fell short.
in the zone outside off stump, tempting delivery, but Dhoni doesn't take the bait.
lands on a length around the off stump and shapes away, Dhoni squeezes it to point
a tad wider and Dhoni goes back and across, covers the off stump and shoulders arms
in the channel outside off stump, left alone
angling away from Yuvraj who allows it to pass the off stump
again, angling away, left alone
fuller, on the leg stump line, Yuvraj, who has been leaning across towards the off side to counter the deliveries angling away, almost loses balance as he tries to flick it and is struck on the pad
back to the outside-off stump line, left alone again
leans across to drive crisply but straight to cover
on the hips, rolls away to the leg side.

appeal for a catch down the leg side but the umpire negates it, suggesting it went off the hip.  It was another delivery cutting to the leg side and he tried to withdraw his gloves from the ball as he swayed away. The ball doesn't seem to be close to the hips, rather goes dangerously close past the gloves.
the bouncer arrives and Dhoni springs into action. He swivels off the front foot to pull it away superbly to the boundary
teasing outswinger outside off stump, left alone
fuller, just outside off stump, Dhoni is late in moving forward as that length demands of him but he lunges out in the end to edge the ball to third man
walks a couple of steps down the track, moving towards the off side in the process, and tries to flick the ball but misses.
Dhoni is standing well outside the crease and allows this ball to go through to the keeper
lovely delivery, cutting back in sharply,  a surprised Dhoni takes the bottom-hand off the handle and stabs it to his pad
fuller, straighter, Dhoni is again late in coming forward but eventually does so and pushes it towards mid-on for a quick single.
Short and just down the leg side, Yuvraj goes for the pull but edges it fine but wide of Ramdin
short of length, cutting away, pushed to point
back of length, on the middle and leg, clipped to square leg
short in length, on the middle and off stump line, tapped to the off side, wants a single but Yuvraj, wisely, sends him back
fuller, moving in late towards middle stump, Dhoni pushes it back to the bowler. Nice little delivery. The first one straightened, this one has come back in, what would the next one do?
he shifts his line to just outside off stump and Dhoni shapes to drive but edges it down to third man
leans well forward to drive to mid-off
Delicious square drive from Yuvraj. It was full outside off stump, he didn't take a big stride out but bent his knees to hold balance and square drove it superbly through cover point.
slightly short in length, pushed out to covers
short in length, around the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Thump. It was short delivery around the off stump and he stood up tall to flat-bat it through mid-off. Whack. Smashed it
angled across Yuvraj who lets it go by
slightly short in length and Yuvraj, in middle of a dream run, slaps it through covers.
full and well outside off stump, Yuvraj stretches across to square drive it to point.
full and on the legs, Dhoni tries to flick it but misses. It rolls off the pad.
short in length and outside off, punched to point
moves in towards middle and leg, turned to midwicket region for a single
leans forward to push to the off side.
angled across Yuvraj who lets it go through to Ramdin.
slightly short in length, swat-pulled past square leg

What a stunner from Yuvi. Jaw-dropping hit. It was slightly short in length on the leg and middle stump line, Yuvraj hopped back and sort of swat-pulled it, lapped it around the corner, and it flew over deep square leg. Rampaul cannot believe it carried that far. Watch it on youtube soon.
Rampaul shifts the line to outside off but pushes it a tad wide and Yuvraj slashes it to deep backward point boundary
straighter, on the off stump line, punched to short cover
clipped off his hips for a single
full in length and moving away from Yuvraj who pushes at it, bat away from the body, and is beaten
back of  length, cutting away from Yuvraj who runs it down to third man
short in length, pushed out to the off side
slower one, on the middle stump line, nudged to the on side
beaten by the outswinger. It was full in length, lured Dhoni into a iffy drive before it left him late.
hops back to jab a straighter delivery to square leg

It cut in from outside off stump, Dhoni walks out, lunging forward in the end, landing on the front heel, and is struck on the pad. Shout for lbw but he was struck just outside off  stump. That saved him.
tries to clip it to the leg side, misses but will collect the leg bye
outside off stump, punched away to deep point region
The keeper is standing up to the stumps now. Bravo hurls a length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended to the off side
slightly short in length, Dhoni moves back to punch it to sweeper cover
stays back to push it past point for a single

Big wicket. Yuvraj is gone to a wide delivery outside off stump. He saw the width and went after it hard but only managed it to edge behind. Taylor and co. are delighted to say the least. Almost a gift. West Indies won't complain. The shot was on; it was well outside off and Yuvraj's eyes must have lit up as he saw the width but he couldn't connect properly.
bangs it short and it goes down the leg side.  A leg gully in place for that delivery. They are trying to ping his rib-cage and hope he fends it to that fielder. Interesting.
just outside off stump this time and Ramdin gathers.
full in length, on the off stump line, Yusuf leans forward to defend. Yusuf is going to be constantly think about that fielder and wondering when the next short delivery is going to come.
Here it comes. And Yusuf goes down under. Game on.
Fuller and Yusuf stretches forward to defend
length delivery around the off stump, gets forward to push it to the off side
short in length, around the off stump, punched to mid-off
on the middle and leg, clipped to square leg
lifting delivery on the middle and leg, Dhoni shuffles across to jab it to backward square leg
short pitched delivery outside off stump, Yusuf went for an almighty cut shot but missed it
lifting delivery outside off stump, Yusuf drops his wrists, gets the bat down and sways away from the line.
the short delivery at the rib cage arrives, Yusuf twists his body, gets on top of the bounce and keeps it down to the ground and the ball bounces to that short leg gully

done in by the short ball, an Indian batsman falling to such a delivery for the umpteenth time, banged it in just outside off, Yusuf was caught by surprise, it shot off the pitch, rapped him on his gloves and went through straight to Gayle at slip who took it easily over his head
oooh, almost, short on middle and leg, tries to fend it off into the leg side, does so uppishly, was nowhere in control there, falls into a safe zone
straying on the pads, tries to clip it behind square, salvages a leg bye
beaten this time, probing him outside off and he prods at it, he nicked a similar delivery to the keeper in the last game, misses it completely this time
a touch of confidence, pushes it firmly behind point
length ball outside off and kept really low, Dhoni had nothing to do with it and went to the keeper on the second bounce
back of a length outside off, guided off the back foot behind point for a single
bouncer, goes for the hook, and unsurprisingly, misses, a touch too high that one
short of a good length outside off, punched crisply to point
short, that's almost a given, gets back, stands tall and drops it into the leg side
testing him outside the off, stays in the crease and pushes it to cover
full and wide, inviting him to drive, Jadeja is tempted but restrains himself in the end
stylishly done, a fraction short outside off, gets behind it and punches it crisply between point and cover for a boundary, nice crunching sound of bat striking ball
much straighter this time, gets on the back foot and plays it to mid-on
slower ball but picked, an offcutter, defended back to the bowler
short outside off, cuts it well but Darren Bravo does well at point to keep them down to one
poor ball, full, meaty ball on the pads, flicked away gracefully behind square leg to beat fine leg to the boundary

Ravindra Jadeja falls in almost similar fashion to the way he got out in the last game. It was a length delivery bursting through the off-stump channel, Jadeja was caught at the crease, just pushed lamely at it and the edge has been taken. West Indies climb all over India.
slash and a miss. It was short of length and just outside off, Harbhajan was cramped for room, tried to go hard with his cut shot and missed it completely
And again. Harbhajan is trying to counterattack his way out of trouble but hasn't connected so far. Dhoni gets across for a chat.
short in length around the off stump, Harbhajan stays beside the line to punch it through covers
short-pitched delivery on the leg and middle, Harbhajan was shuffling across, couldn't get away from the line and fended it off uppishly but short of square leg
And that short delivery forced Harbhajan to stay back for this one. But this was fuller and Harbhajan lunged out in the end to push at it and inside-edged it almost back to his stumps.
slips to the pads, turned past square leg for a single
outside off stump, left alone and Ramdin, standing up to the stumps for Dhoni, collects
short in length and a tad wide outside off, punched to sweeper cover
leans forward to push to extra cover
outside off stump, straightening, left alone for Ramdin
full and moving in, worked to midwicket region for a single
short in length and outside off stump, Dhoni forces it to deep cover region for a single
short delivery just outside off stump, Harbhajan plays his unique thump shot to covers. the bat was held almost vertical and he played a badminton type shot out to cover
gets behind the line of this length delivery to defend
short and climbing on the off stump line, hops back to defend it to the off side
fuller, on the middle and off line, driven to mid-on
low full toss on the off stump line, punched through wide mid-off region
leans forward to drive to the off side
short of length delivery tailing in around the off stump, tries to punch it to extra cover but edges it to square leg and Ramdin rushes after it
length delivery outside off stump, Harbhajan leans across to push it to cover

Dhoni is in danger of being stranded here. Another edge from an Indian batsman. Yet another catch for Ramdin. It was full in length and in the troublesome channel outside off stump, Harbhajan drove inside the line and the ball caught the outside edge. Bravo erupts. His team-mates converge upon him. Dhoni stands alone.
leans forward to drive to mid-off
full pitched outside off stump, mistimes the drive to left of mid-off
gets forward to defend to the off side.
back-of-length delivery on the middle stump line, defended to the off side

What a day for West Indies. And you could say the same thing for India as well. It wasbanged short in length and straightening outside off stump, Praveen didn't have much room, neither was he in great position but he went for the cut but was beaten by the extra bounce. The edge flew to first slip.
short and climbing outside off, pushed to the off side
The perfume ball arrives. RP Singh ducks into the bouncer and the ball crashes into his gloves but falls short of the short-leg fielder.
full in length and outside off, left alone. The crowd clear their throat in appreciation for a fine spell of bowling from Rampaul, who is back-slapped by many of his team-mates
slower one, full and on the off and middle line, Dhoni checks his drive, crouches to push the ball to point region
pushes it wide down the leg side and Ramdin flies to his left with the outstretched left hand to collect it superbly. What a fine day he has had.
another slower one, well outside off this time, Dhoni is early into his slash-drive and misses it
The third slower one this over and again, Dhoni doesn't pick it up and goes through early with his drive. The ball bounces towards Ramdin
Fooled by the fourth slower one! Dhoni checks his drive and stabs it uppishly towards extra cover ..
full and well outside off stump, left alone
drifts in towards the middle, flicked to deep midwicket but Dhoni refuses to take the single. He wants the strike.
full and on the off and middle line, driven to cover
steps out but mistimes the drive to long-on. He doesn't take the single, though.
moves down the track, Benn drags it shorter and it goes off the pad to the off side
slaps this hard to the right of long-off where Morton makes a fine diving stop
charges down the track to loft this one over long-on for a big six.
pushes this towards long-on for a single to retain the strike
Another slower one from Bravo! Dhoni was charging down the track, adjusts to push it to cover

If you are a cruel man, you could say Bravo dropped this. Dhoni had smashed it hard - it was another slower one- back to Bravo who pushed his hand out and before he could withdraw it from the line of fire, the ball crashed into his right palm. He is in great pain. The physio is out there.The right thumb has swelled up. It looks rather ugly. He is going to continue now, though and the crowd applaud.
you guessed it right; it was the slower one, Dhoni checks his shot and drags it to the on side
65.6 slower short-of-length delivery, punched to long-off for a single.
slower one, loopy dipping delivery on the middle, pushed to long-on. They won't take the single, though
full in length, normal pace this time, sliding to hit the pad on the leg stump line
from round the stumps, short in length on the hips, Dhoni shuffles across to push it past square leg for couple of runs
84.7 mph full in length, on the middle, defended to the on side
short in length, outside off stump, cut straight to extra cover where Gayle makes a mess of it
slower one, full and outside off stump line, pushed to Gayle
full pitched around off stump, square driven to point
short in length, forced through the off side
slower one again, punched to the deep field on the on side but he doesn't take the single
length delivery on the off stump, defended to the off side
full in length, around the off stump, drives to long-off
short and wide, goes for the cut but bottom-edges it to the ground and the ball rolls to the off side

RP Singh is almost run out. It was the slower one from Bravo, Dhoni lunges out to push it towards Gayle at extra cover. He took couple of steps down the track and RP rushed across before he was sent back. Gayle took aim and fired. Miss. Overthrow. Dhoni will retain the strike!
pushed to point
comes down the track and drives to long-on and this time he takes the single.
leans forward to defend to the off side of the pitch
on the off stump line, pushed to covers
quicker, fuller, RP bottom-edges the drive to the off side
on the middle and off stump line, steered to point
short in length on the off stump line, pushed to covers for a single
short of length delivery outside off stump, RP tries to punch it to the off side, inside edges it to left of Ramdin who dives and takes some pace of it
back of length delivery, pulled to deep square leg to right of Darren
another short delivery, pulled to Darren at deep midwicket for a single
fuller, straighter, pushed to long-on but they don't take the run
on the leg and middle, turned to midwicket
low full toss, pushed back to the bowler
yorker length on the middle stump line, dug out to the off side
turning away to the off side, pushed to cover
turning outside off stump, slightly shirt, RP goes for the cut and is beaten
slows up the pace, flighted full, defended to the off side
full toss, patted back to the bowler.
leans forward to defend to the off side of the pitch
slower one, lands on a length, comes in, punched back to the bowler
length delivery on the off stump line, steered to right of short third man
short in length outside off stump, guided to backward point
fuller on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
slower one, on the leg stump line, worked to deep midwicket but they don't take the run. Dhoni will be on strike
wide down the leg side and Ramdin can't get across in time
moves outside leg stump and hits a full toss straight to cover
backs away again and Benn fires in a yorker, Dhoni tries to dig it out and edges it past the leg stump
on the middle stump line, RP leans forward to defend
fuller, on the off stump line, pushed to cover
slows up the pace, bit more air, defended on the front foot
on the middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler
short and wide, cut to deep point for a single
short delivery around the off stump line, defended to the off side
lovely straight drive from RP. It was overpitched on the off stump and RP drives it past the bowler. Dhoni smiles as he punches RP's gloves
length delivery on the off and middle, defended to the off side
fullish, on the off stump line, driven to sweeper cover
yorker length on the middle, tapped down the track
full and just outside off stump, left alone
well up to the bat, pushed down to mid-off
slower, pushed to right of point, confusion about the single and in the end, they decide against it
slight turn on the off stump line, tapped to point
quicker one, just outside off, left alone
flighted full, slower through the air, on the middle, defended to the off side
goes back to wrist the back-of-length delivery past square leg and he runs hard to come back for the second run. And that's his fifty as well. He is playing the lone hand here
short of length around the off stump, defended to point
clips it to square leg for a single
in the zone outside off stump, RP tries to run it down to third man, misses, and is beaten
length delivery on the off stump line, defended to cover
full and on the off stump line, squeezed to third man
tries to step down the track and is greeted by a yorker which he stabs back down the pitch
again, he moves down the track and once again, he gets an yorker, dug out through cover point
on the middle and off, defended to the off side
fuller, on the middle, worked to midwicket
turned to right of midwicket, Dhoni wants a single but gets back in a hurry
slower, tossed up outside off, driven to sweeper cover
full in length outside off, driven to sweeper cover for a single
gets forward to drive to long-on for a single
full pitched on the off and middle, hit down to long-off
fullish, outside off, sliced to deep point region
glides forward to ping long-off
the fortuitous inside edge. Dhoni wanted to go for the big hit  but edges the yorker past the stumps and down to fine-leg boundary
backs away to hit the full toss to long-off
flighted full outside off, driven in the air towards long-off
Another yorker from Benn who has bowled superbly against Dhoni, who digs it out to the on side
pushed towards midwicket and before Taylor got to the ball, they rush across for the single
low full toss on the middle, defended back to Benn
short of length delivery bouncing outside off, Dhoni forces it off the back foot  and slashes it well to the left of short third man
short and wide, cut away to Sarwan at deep cover
Swing and a miss. Full and outside off, RP was looking for the big hit over mid-off but didn't connect
full again, sliced in the air to left of mid-off for a single
slightly slower, on the middle and leg, worked to deep midwicket
length delivery around the off stump line, RP drives inside the line and is beaten
floated on the middle, from round the stumps and Gayle moves to his right to stop the ball
will get a single with a big drive to long-on
pushed across RP who allows Ramdin to collect
slower, on the middle and leg, flicked to square leg
shapes to paddle but Gayle pushes it outside off and he defends
works the flighted delivery to right of midwicket for a single
on the middle and leg, skidding on quickly, pushed to the bowler
full toss, swatted away straight to deep midwicket
drifts in towards off stump before turning past the outside edge, RP was trying to look to turn it to the leg side
Gayle moves into slip now. Full on the middle, defended to Benn
lands outside off, left alone
full outside off stump, guided past backward point for a single
leans across to defend to the off side
gets back to defend to the on side
moves forward to swing it to deep midwicket region
stays back to punch it to cover
on the leg stump line, runs off the pad to short fine-leg region
slower in the air, on the off stump, defended to the off side
full on the middle, driven to long-on

Ramdin fails to run out RP. It was pushed to covers where GAyle collected and threw the ball to Ramdin. RP was sent back by Dhoni and he was short of the crease when Ramdin failed to collect the ball cleanly; he broke the stumps with his gloves with the ball popping out of his grasp
pushes it through the on side and this time there is no confusion, easy single
leans forward to defend
driven through covers for a single
on the middle stump line, leans forward to defend
still from round the stumps, fires in quick and down the leg side, wide
runs couple of steps down the track and turns the ball past square leg and Dhoni runs hard to come back for the second run
tries to flick it, misses and the ball rolls off the pad
full and just outside leg stump, Dhoni calmly plays a deft glance and picks up a boundary. Very well played
another wide down the leg side
on the middle, punched to long-off
on the leg and middle, defended to Gayle
yorker length outside off, steered to point
full and on the leg stump line, turned to deep backward square leg for a single
stays back to cut it to deep point region
moves down the track, Benn fires in a yorker, squeezed to the on side
lunges forward to drive to long-on
RP Singh you beauty! The crowd applaud the effort. It was flighted on the off stump line and he lifted it superbly over long-off. He just leaned forward to lift it through the line. Up, up and over.
And now lets a delivery just outside off stump to turn to Ramdin
dropped by Rampaul at long-on. Dhoni crashed it hard and straight to Rampaul, who was a few metres inside the boundary, leaped but ended up palming it over him
leans forward to drive to cover
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket for a single
flicked past square leg for a single
back of length, pushed to extra cover
slower one outside off, left alone
from round the stumps, on the pads, rolls to short fine-leg
yorker on the middle stump, RP just about manages to dig it out
another yorker, edged to midwicket
driven down to long-on
on the leg stump line, turned to deep backward square leg. THe partnership is now 99

And with this wide down the leg side  the partnership is now 100. It's flashed on the scoreboard and a generous applause goes round the stadium. Fine effort from the captain and the bowler to push India out of the big hole
leans forward to defend to the off side
length delivery outside off stump, flashed to backward point
stays back to swat it away to long-off
Finally, RP falls. A valiant rear-guard action ends. He pulls weakly straight to midwicket. But what a fine fighting innings this has been. Well played RP.
wide outside the off stump, left alone
lifting delivery, stands up tall to push it out to the on side
just outside off stump, guided to backward point
a lovely slow yorker from Bravo, Nehra seems to have been all but cleaned up but manages to dig it out in the end.
moves to 95 with the inside-edged boundary to fine-leg. He moved outside leg and went for the big ugly swipe across the line but got a nice fat edge

he moves outside leg as he charges out but Taylor slips in a slower one. Dhoni tries to lunge across to cut but misses it. The boy on the burning deck falls finally. What a fine captain's knock it has been.

inn2.comm: full in length, just outside off stump, Gayle pushes it out to cover
pushed well outside off stump, left alone
in the channel outside off, moving away, left alone
back of length, curving in towards the leg stump line, tries to glance, misses but it runs off the thigh pad
full and on the off stump line, defends to cover
fuller, around the off stump line, driven straight to mid-off
Slap. Short and wide, Morton crashes it past point. He flayed that.
a tad fuller, again angling away, left alone this time. There was some width on offer but Morton let it go past him
again lands outside off and moves away further, left alone
length delivery, closer to the off stump, punched to short extra cover
straighter and driven crisply to left of mid-on where RP makes a diving stop
short and lifting towards the rib cage, tucked to fine-leg region for a single
length delivery outside off, Gayle stays back to punch it to extra cover
slower one, on the middle and off line, deflected to Gambhir at short midwicket

Wallop. That has almost decapitated Praveen. It was slightly short in length and Gayle crashed it hard past the startled bowler. And Gayle puts his hand up to say sorry! What a hard hit that was. Praveen crouched covering his face with his hands as the ball whistled past his face
short in length, pushed to cover
slower one, on a length, on the middle and off, and again, Gayle punches it hard back down the pitch and Praveen stops
Gayle opens-up his stance to force it to midwicket where Gambhir makes right royal mess of it and the ball slips through him
on a length, around the off stump, punched hard to short extra cover
lands on the good length, moves towards off stump, pushed away to short extra cover again
a tad fuller, around the off stump, pushed towards mid-off
length delivery straightening on the middle, defended back down the pitch
full in length, on the off stump line, Morton stretches forward to defend
turns it to right of mid-on for a single
drifts towards the pads, clipped away for a single
from round the stumps now, a slower one, full and on the middle, turned to midwicket region for a single
short in length on the off and middle, pushed to left of mid-on for a single
short in length, coming in from round the stumps, dragged to Gambhir at deep midwicket
short and wide, goes for the cut, edges it, along the ground, behind the wicket to left of Dhoni
back of length on the off stump, punched to mid-off
tucked past square leg and they scamper back for the second run
full in length and outside off, forced away to long-on for a single.
the first bouncer of the chase, Morton sways out of the way
84. 9 mph length delivery on the middle, moving towards the off stump, punched to mid-on

bouncing delivery from back of length, on the off stump line, shapes to punch, adjusts to the extra bounce by taking the bottom-hand off the handle and pushes the ball towards mid-off for a quick single

fullish, outside off stump, slashed away hard to wide third man where PK dives to his left to make a desperate attempt to save it, manages to stop the ball but as he went over the ball was in contact with some part of his body
length delivery turned to midwicket where Rohit Sharma swoops on the ball and has a shy at the non-striker's end. He misses and the ball runs away to the boundary.
back-of-length delivery just outside off stump, punched to short extra cover
slower one just outside off stump, cut down to third man for a single
from round the stumps, moving in, turned to Gambhir running in from deep midwicket
mistimes the punchy drive to Harbhajan at mid-off
slightly back of length, tries to pull it away but edges it to his pad
similar delivery and this time he mistimes the pull shot but clears mid-on ... it was almost similar to how he got out in the first match
he gets the shot correctly on the third try. He cleared the front leg and thrashed it high over long-on. Fierce thump.
charges out, moving outside leg and has a big go at the full delivery but misses it. The ball goes between him and the leg stump
Thwack. Some width outside off and he killed it through extra cover. Again, he opened-up his stance and forced it off the back foot
Gayle is turning on the heat here. Down the wicket and the big swing over midwicket. Just 136 runs more now.
length delivery on the off stump line, defended to the off side
back of length, on the middle stump line, turned to wide midwicket for a single Gayle on strike. This should be fun
retreats back in the crease, opens-up his stance again, looking for anything slightly short but RP lands it on the length, pushed through mid-on
the bouncer on the middle stump line, Morton was caught unawares, got into a tangle and top edges the pull to backward square leg
Crash. Again, that front leg is cleared, RP serves outside off, and he punches it to cover where Rohit mis-fields
dragged to the on side for a single
fires it in quick on a length on the off stump, Gayle simply stands tall and delivers. He punched that beautifully between the bowler and mid-off. Easily done.
punched to left of mid-off and the direct hit at the non-striker's end from RP yields an extra run.
angled into the pad, flat and fast, worked between the keeper and leg slip for another boundary
fuller, quick again, Morton fails to connect with the flick and is hit on the pad
connects with the flick this time and picks a single
slower on the leg stump line, early into the flick and the ball bounds to the off side
flighted around the off stump, leans forward to drive it back to the bowler
just outside off stump, a tad short in length, goes back to try to late cut but misses it
on the off stump line, tapped to first slip
slows up the pace, tosses it full on the middle, turned past square leg
flighted delivery on the middle and off line, driven down to long-off
turns in ever so slowly from outside off, Morton hangs on his back foot to cut it to deep point
slower this time, pushed past the diving bowler who deflects it away and the straightish midwicket fielder rushes to get the ball
leans forward to turn to midwicket
quicker, turning towards off, tries to play a delicate cut and edges it past the leg stump
moves forward to drive to long-on
one-handed hit to the straight boundary! He was beaten in the flight as Yusuf slowed up the pace but he adjusted superbly by taking the bottom-hand off the handle and went through with the shot.
pushes this to the on side
from round the stumps, flighted on the middle, driven to wide long-on region
goes back, tries to clip the ball outside leg stump, misses and Dhoni gathers
stretches forward to defend to the on side of the pitch
lands outside leg stump line, deflected to deep midwicket and that's his 39th fifty. Breezy and entertaining as ever
on driven to long-on for a single
flighted outside leg, turns in, Gayle goes back to clip it to deep square leg
skips down the track and drives to long-on
lunges forward to work it to square leg for a single
floated full on the middle and off, Gayle waited before tapping it to cover point for a single
moves down the track and flicks it to midwicket
comes down the track, Rohit drags back the length and its jabbed away
turning past the leg stump, Morton goes for the pull, misses and is struck on the pad. Shout for lbw but it would have missed leg
slightly short, outside off, cut away to backward point
flighted on the off stump line, driven to long-off
goes down on his knee to play a nice-looking cover drive to deep cover
drifts down the leg side, wide. Just 99 runs more
floated full on the middle and off line, Gayle drives along the ground to left of long-off where DK tries to stop it with a dive but ...
And the big slog sweep is out now. He went down on his back knee and thrashed the flighted delivery over midwicket boundary. Gayle is indulging himself out there. Fun to watch.
a tad quicker one, pushed through the on side
quicker, flatter, defended to the on side

Gautam takes a superb catch running to his right at long-off. Gayle had moved outside leg stump and crashed it flat to right of Gambhir who charged across and dived in the air to take it with two hands. It would have been a six had he not got to it. The entertaining knock comes to an end
Sars gets off the mark with a clip to deep midwicket
slower through the air, turns in, defended to the off side
quicker, flatter and down the leg side, chipped to deep backward square leg
floated on the leg and middle, flicked past square leg
on the off stump line, driven to sweeper cover
full, on the leg and middle, whipped down to long-on
on the middle, defended on the front foot
on the leg stump line, turned to backward square leg
quicker one, just outside off, cut to deep point region
flighted full, driven to long-off
flighted outside off stump, driven to deep cover for a single
drops just short of blockhole, pushed out to cover
leans forward to flick to midwicket
tossed up outside off stump, driven to left of Nehra at long-off
on the middle stump line, turned past square leg
on the middle and leg, worked to square leg
full pitched delivery on the leg and middle, whipped to deep midwicket region
length delivery on the off stump, guided to backward point
full in length, around off stump, driven to covers where Harbhajan makes a sliding stop to his right
slightly short in length and outside off stump, chopped down to third man

fires across a bouncer, Morton is late on the pull and edges it to the right of the diving Dhoni. Morton hustles Sarwan into the running for the second and Sars just about makes it into his crease. Both get together to have a chat
punched to mid-off for a single
flighted outside off, goes for the big hit but drags it to midwicket
goes back to turn it to fine leg
runs down the track and drives to long-off
skips down the track and drives it back to the bowler who has a direct hit at the striker's end
goes right back to flick it for a single
charges down the track and drives to left of Gambhir at long-on
moves forward to drive to cover
on the leg and middle, clipped to square leg
length delivery angling away from Sarwan who tries to drive inside-out and misses. Free hit coming up, though.
backs away to smash a slower one over extra-cover. He picked the ball and smoked it
short in length, cut away to deep point for a single
Morton seems to have got into trouble whenever he has been bounced at today. Another awkward looking pull, another miss. Dhoni collects.
fuller, straight on the middle, pushed past the bowler to mid-off
Rohit gets his second ODI wicket.  Sarwan charged down the track, Rohit pushed it slightly wider and Sarwan lunged out in the end and missed it completely. Dhoni does the rest.
leans across to push to point
lands outside off, spins away, left alone
on the middle stump line, defended to the on side of the pitch
goes forward to drive to cover
floated full, driven to long-off
from round the stumps, moving in, tucked behind square leg for a single
on the middle stump line, punched down to long-on
short in length outside off, mistimes the drive to cover
fuller, outside off, dragged past square leg
bangs in a bouncer, Morton ducks even as it goes just down the leg side
another short delivery attempted, it sits up for Morton who pulls it through wide mid-on. And that's his fifty.
keeps a touch low and a surprised Morton quickly crouches to keep it out
outside off stump, pushed to cover
flighted outside off, driven to right of Rohit who makes a diving stop
just outside off stump, driven to Yusuf at cover
slower, flighted outside off, again driven to Yusuf
slightly short, swatted away to long-on
flighted across, lifted towards long-on for a single
turning in towards middle, defended off the back foot
goes back to work it with the turn to square leg. There was some confusion but Chanderpaul ges across in time to beat the throw from Dkarthik
lovely flighted delivery drifting in from round the stumps and luring Chanderpaul into a check-drive. The ball was in the air but fell just short of the diving cover fielder
leans forward to defend it back down the pitch
curves in from round the stumps and goes past the prod,.. s
stretches forward to cover drive for a singel
gets forward to drive towards long-on
drives hard but straight to Gambhir at long-on
fuller, on the middle and off, driven to Gambhir
stays back to punch the off break to ... Gambhir again
well outside off stump, slightly short, cut past cover for a single
moves down the track and drives to long-on for yet another single
slightly short in length, turning in from outside off, Morton plays a deft late cut
down the leg side, mistimes the sweep to short fine-leg
full and on the middle and leg, on driven to long-on
shuffles across to turn it towards square leg and wants a run but is sent back by Morton. Chanderpaul just about gets back into the crease.
turns in towards middle, deflected to backward square leg for a single
short in length, quicker and flatter, dabbed to short third man
full and outside off, Chanderpaul is beaten on the drive
gets in line this time and on drives to long-on
drifts down the leg side, flicked to Praveen at fine-leg
well outside off stump, left alone
quicker, flatter, edges the sweep to short fine-leg region
floated on the leg stump line and Morton sweeps hard and well. Just 27 more now.
flighted on the off stump line, punched to long-off, Harbhajan tried to intercept it with a dive and seems to have hurt himself
just outside off stump, tapped to left of Gambhir at short third-man
quicker, outside off stump, left alone
slower, on the off stump, pushed to Karthik at cover
around the off stump line, defended on the front foot
turning from the off stump line, squeezed to short third-man
hangs on the back foot to punch to long-on
on the pads, clipped to fine-leg for couple of runs
length delivery on the off stump, driven to cover
the slow bouncer, Chanderpaul is made to wait and he swats it down to midwicket
short in length, misses the pull and is hit on the  groin. He is in pain. The physio comes out.  The physio has a long chat with Chanders and both men end it laughing
another slow bouncer, swatted to square leg
tossed up around middle and off, driven to long-off
goes right back to push it between the bowler and midwicket, down to long-on
flighted delivery and Chanderpaul pings long-off again
stretches forward to deflect it to midwicket
on the off stump line, cut to left of Gambhir at short third-man
topspinner on the middle stump line, edges the flick to his pad
swinging yorker just outside leg stump, Morton tries to flick and is hit on the pad
full pitched delivery, driven to long-on
on the middle stump line, nurdled around the corner for a single
71.2 mph short-pitched delivery around the off stump and Morton hammers it over midwicket. Easy pickings.
fuller in length, curving away, punched back to Praveen
short in length, on the middle, punched down to long-on
just outside off stump, beaten on the late cut
slower through the air, loopy delivery on the middle and leg, Morton loses balance on the front foot but manages to tickle it to fine-leg
on the middle, topspinner, gets a leading edge back to the bowler
a tad short in length, turning into off, dabbed to point
quicker one, full outside off, nudged to short third man
slower, on the middle, worked to right of  midwicket for a single
moves forward to defend to the on side
comes down the track and drives the full toss back to the bowler
stays back to push the off break back to the bowler
quicker one but it slips down the leg side
turning in towards the off stump, cut to left of short third man where Nehra doesn't stop it cleanly
comes down the track to deflect it to right of midwicket
floated on the middle stump line, defended to the on side

Morton swings the flighted delivery to long-on stands and pumps his fist. West Indies have leveled the series in style. Victory easily achieved after they had scythed through the Indian batting line-up. Dhoni resisted valiantly and found support from RP Singh but it only delayed the inevitable. Congrats West Indies.
